channel.title: Happy Slapping
channel.description:
i've recently heard about Happy Slapping and i think it's really pointless and stupid thing to do. People who do such things are really messed up in the head.
here's a link to a video of Happy slapping thing : http://www.efukt.com/view.php?id=121
post your comments about Happy Slapping
EDIT :The link i gave has porn adverts , so it's not suitable for kids...(thanks ilyaostr9 :P )

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

geez what the fuck is that pointless BS, i would fucking shoot them if i saw them again

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“one uglybird, post:12, topic:29604”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=43458.msg530085#msg530085 date=1164566639]
You can be as badass as you like, but knives are fuckin’ sharp.

That said, most people that pull a knife don’t have the balls to use it. When you come up against the 1% that do though, you will realise that a noob with a knife can take down someone who took some shitty martial art for 4 years without much difficulty.
[/quote]

1: I have a knife too, and a concealed weapon permit
2: Don’t fucking make fun of bushido
3: I’d knife em first- the best defense is a strong offense[/quote]

Yes, I took 3 months of kempo (like karate ) and even that help me. I’ve beet up 2 people this year, 3 in the last.
But always in self defence, I never start fights

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

one uglybird:

WTF?! Why the hell were they doing that?! If that was me, for the first 10 seconds or so, I would’ve done exactly what he did- Ask “Dude, what did I do? Why the hell are you doing this; stop now god damn it!” Then, I’d pull out my knife and fucking stab them, cuz I literally never leave campus without a knife in my pocket, and yes, I have a concealed weapon permit.

Good job ;D

Read full topic

wtf he just go the crap beat out of him and was still on the ground. wtf it looks fake

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“one uglybird, post:10, topic:29604”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=43458.msg529969#msg529969 date=1164564568]
Also pulling out a knife is just gonna make it more likely for you to get knifed by someone else who has a knife as well.
[/quote]

Took 4 years of bushido down in Murfreesboro at Bill Taylor’s Bushido school of karate. I’ve whooped a number of guys asses, but only cuz they deserved it. I think I can handle myself.[/quote]

Well you don’t need a knife. Kick their ass or run.

Uhh…a concealed weapon permit != a licence to stab people.

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:17, topic:29604”][quote author=one uglybird link=topic=43458.msg530101#msg530101 date=1164566790]

You can be as badass as you like, but knives are fuckin’ sharp.

That said, most people that pull a knife don’t have the balls to use it. When you come up against the 1% that do though, you will realise that a noob with a knife can take down someone who took some shitty martial art for 4 years without much difficulty.

1: I have a knife too, and a concealed weapon permit
2: Don’t fucking make fun of bushido
3: I’d knife em first- the best defense is a strong offense
[/quote]

1: Cool, prisons are fairly comfortable these days.
2: I wasn’t making fun of it, martial arts are great for self-discipline and as a display sport. For a street fight however, you may as well be learning ballet.
3: Goto 1.[/quote]

1: Self defense+permit=Air-tight court case
2: Ok, then THAT’S insulting it.
3: Goto 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Street fighting > all other martial arts

Street fighting is far more valuable then doing a triple backflip and then dancing around. You always see people, especially on the springer show(used to love that show long time ago) who explain their martial arts, and then get their ass kicked.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Slapping
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Yeah its pointless and just violent. I do think that was fake though because he didn’t flinch like you would expect someone to flinch if they’re getting punched in the back of the head. It seemed a bit fake but still you hear about it in the news all the time and its just stupid.

Also pulling out a knife is just gonna make it more likely for you either to:
a. Hurt someone and get in trouble
b. Get knifed by someone else who has a knife as well

Just run if you’re attacked, its not being a pussy if 10 guys jump you and wanna beat the shit out of you, its just being smart.

Read full topic

if that was me i would run away(im not going to fight, they’re with too many).then i would call a few of my friends and fight those idiots.
[/quote]

or i could do the same thing like you would do.you’d be suprised if you knew how many people are scared of a simple knife
